keyMoments.title: Robin Discovers Ancient Writings
keyMoments.description: Robin discovers and deciphers ancient stone writings on the island, revealing that Drim is not the true culprit behind the memory theft.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Robin's archaeological expertise and her crucial role in uncovering the truth about the memory thief, advancing the plot toward the arc's resolution.

keyMoments.title: Directing Crew to Palace of Sea God
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her findings to direct the Straw Hats to the Palace of the Sea God, where they will find the true source of the memory theft.
keyMoments.significance: Robin's discovery sets the course for the climax of the Ocean's Dream Arc.
keyMoments.quote: Everyone, we need to head to the Palace of the Sea God. That's where we'll find our answers.

keyMoments.title: Flashback with Kaya
keyMoments.description: A flashback shows Usopp's friendship with Kaya in Syrup Village, where he would tell her stories.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights one of Usopp's defining relationships and memories that have been stolen by Noko.

keyMoments.title: Usopp Builds a Raft
keyMoments.description: Despite having no memories, Usopp demonstrates his natural resourcefulness by building a raft to reach the island.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Usopp's inherent skills and talents persist even without his memories, foreshadowing his future role as a craftsman.

keyMoments.title: Flashback with Zeff
keyMoments.description: A flashback depicts Sanji's past with Zeff on the deserted island, highlighting their bond and Sanji's journey to becoming a cook.
keyMoments.significance: Emphasizes one of Sanji's most important relationships and formative memories that have been stolen.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Flashback with Dr. Hiriluk
keyMoments.description: A flashback shows Chopper being taken in and raised by Dr. Hiriluk, depicting their father-son relationship.
keyMoments.significance: Highlights Chopper's most precious memory and the foundation of his character - his relationship with Dr. Hiriluk.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Finds Nami
keyMoments.description: Luffy tracks down and catches Nami, then explains to her and the others that he is their captain and they are all part of the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's leadership and determination to reunite his crew during a crisis.
keyMoments.quote: I'm your captain! We're the Straw Hat Pirates!

keyMoments.title: Zoro Hypnotized by Drim
keyMoments.description: Drim approaches Zoro in the forest and uses hypnotic powers to place him under control, turning him against his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Major turning point as one of the crew's strongest fighters becomes an enemy, setting up the conflict for the next episode where Luffy must face his first mate.

keyMoments.title: Reunion with Memory-Lost Crew
keyMoments.description: Nami reunites with Usopp, Sanji, and Chopper on the island, though none of them remember each other.
keyMoments.significance: Begins the process of reuniting the scattered Straw Hat crew members.

keyMoments.title: Hypnotizes Zoro
keyMoments.description: Drim uses his hypnotic abilities to take control of Zoro, turning the swordsman against his own crew.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the extent of Drim's powers and creates a major obstacle for the Straw Hats by turning their strongest fighter against them.

reveals.information: Can hypnotize people by looking into their eyes, as demonstrated on Zoro

relationships.description: Drim is being controlled by the seahorse Noko and acts as his unwitting accomplice in stealing memories.
